• Include these codes as defined in http://fhir.org/guides/itech-uw/who-smart-hiv-dak/CodeSystem/concept-codes

    HIV.C.DE59Serum creatinine testScreenings and diagnostics for PrEP users - Serum creatinine test

    HIV.C.DE64Pregnancy testingScreenings and diagnostics for PrEP users - Pregnancy testing
    HIV.C.DE65Review vaccination historyScreenings and diagnostics for PrEP users - Review vaccination history
